A workspace in the City Centre

A calm work environment in Barcelona's cultural quarter. Functional spaces with everything you need in the authentic atmosphere of El Raval.

We offer you

Air conditioning

Our air conditioning is so good, it'll make you forget that summer even exists.

Sunny Terrace

Take your sunglasses to work and join discussions like what is the best sunscreen brand...

Freshly ground, tasty coffee

Good coffee is a hug in a mug.

Shower

You can come dirty to the office. Or have a workout during the day.

Easy Access

We'll set you up with a code or key-fob to enter and leave as you please.

Wheelchair friendly

Ground floor has no steps.
